job.title: Sr. Data Engineer (REMOTE)
job.description: brbrstrongJob SummarybrbrstrongAllied World is seeking an individual to lead integration efforts of underwriting and claims platforms with our corporate Enterprise Data Warehouse EDW The successful candidate will work within our Agile environment as part of a Scrum team to develop new and support preexisting Extract Transform amp Load ETL processesÂ  We look for people who can work effectively within a team as well as take the lead on new initiativesbrbrstrongJob Dutiesbrbrstrong  ulliWork with EDW amp Architecture groups to define and implement integration of new systems and processesli liParticipate in peer code reviews and adhere to best practice development methodologies li liParticipate in an oncall rotation to provide warehouse support if issues ariseliul
